text: I'm Michael Sam
I'm a I'm a football player
I'm gay
is this a huge deal
I understand it is but my purpose and
focus right now is playing football
I came out to my team this last August
and coming out to them they rallied
around me they supported me and I I knew
in that moment that this can happen
anywhere if my team can support me any
team can support me and just the love
and support they gave me this past
season just show and we can't we got a
12 and 2 record and so we had success it
was not difficult for me to come out to
my team everyone was just like shaking
their hand and their heads just like
finally Michael Sam came out and then it
was very sporting and it was like I was
like I was kind of nervous I was like
man I'm actually doing it but santen is
how everyone reaction was was so like
awesome and not just I these are my
teammates these are my brothers I can
play for these guys I'm coming out
because I want to oh my truth I'm
comfortable Who I am and I didn't want
anyone to break a story that brought me
telling it and I want to tell it the way
I wanted to tell it you know it's 2014
I can't tell society to agree with this
or not to agree with this but hopefully
society would see will rally around me
and support me to second consecutive
game with three sacks I came out to my
family they were they said they still
love me for who I was they were proud of
me
they had they already knew they were
just pretty much waiting for me to tell
them and I can I even though we had a
lot of hardship growing up I couldn't be
proud of my parents at how supported it
was for me their old school and just and
they love me and I'm the baby baby boy I
don't think I should be defined as
Michael Sam the gay athlete the gay
football player I want to be defined
Michael Sam for for being a great person
and have great character I want to be a
football player I want to be I want to
be playing in the NFL and just to see
people to see this that I may be the
first but you know I probably may be the
first but I won't be the last
and I think only good things is going to
come from this
